label: Young Adventurer
description: Just stepping into the world, full of dreams, fire, and recklessness.

label: Seasoned Scout
description: A balance of strength and caution, beginning to shape their legacy.

label: Veteran
description: Hardened by countless trials, with scars that tell stories.

label: Elder
description: Carries the wisdom of decades. Still capable, yet weary.

label: Ancient Soul
description: A relic of bygone eras, their mere presence is a whisper of history.
